id.title: ID
id.description: A system-generated opaque ID that uniquely identifies the brand

accountid.title: Account ID
accountid.description: The ID of the account that identifies the advertiser and buyer that own the order.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: User notes related to this line.

contacts.description: A list of one or more contacts with the organisation

orderid.title: Order ID
orderid.description: The ID of the Order that the Change is Requested for.

lineid.title: Line ID
lineid.description: The ID of the Line in the Order that the Change is Requested for.

requesterid.title: Requester ID
requesterid.description: The OrganisationID of the Change Requester.

status.description: A value that indicates the current state of the approval process. The approval process confirms the organizatoin's identity

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.description: URI which is called when the change is approved, rejected or modified by the Seller.
